000729.SZ.summary: Beijing Yanjing Brewery Co.,Ltd. engages in brewing beer in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It also produces and sells beverages, including mineral water, etc. The company was formerly known as Shunyi County Brewery and changed its name to Beijing Yanjing Brewery Co.,Ltd. in March 1984. Beijing Yanjing Brewery Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

000752.SZ.summary: Tibet Development Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of beer under the Lhasa brand in China. It offers fresh beer, draft beer, beverage, pure water, liquor, and other alcoholic drinks. The company is also involved in the development and sale of computer software and hardware. The company was formerly known as Tibet Galaxy Science & Technology Development Co., Ltd. Tibet Development Co., Ltd. is based in Lhasa, China.

000929.SZ.summary: Lanzhou Huanghe Enterprise Co., Ltd produces, processes, and sells beer, beverages, barley, malt, and forage. It is also involved in the agricultural, investment guarantee, and packaging and printing businesses. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Lanzhou, China.

000995.SZ.summary: Gansu Huangtai Wine-Marketing Industry Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and sale of liquor and wine in China. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Wuwei, China.

002461.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Zhujiang Brewery Co., Ltd engages in the production and dealing of beer and its related products. The company sells its products in Hong Kong, Macao, Canada, the United States, Russia, Finland, Costa Rica, the United Kingdom, Holland, Sweden, Denmark, Iceland, France, Spain, Portugal, Italy, and internationally. Guangzhou Zhujiang Brewery Co., Ltd was founded in 1985 and is based in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

0168.HK.summary: Tsingtao Brewery Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, distribution, wholesale, and retail sale of beer products worldwide. It operates through seven segments: Shandong Region; South China Region; North China Region; East China Region; Southeast China Region; Hong Kong, Macau and Other Overseas Region; and Finance Company. The company sells its beer products primarily under the Tsingtaoand and Laoshan brand names. It also provides wealth management, and agency collection and payment services; and construction and logistics services. The company was founded in 1903 and is headquartered in Qingdao, the People's Republic of China.

600132.SS.summary: Chongqing Brewery Co., Ltd. produces and distributes beers in Chongqing, Sichuan, Hunan, and other places. It offers beers under the Chongqing, Mountain City, Carlsberg, and Lebao series names. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Chongqing, China.

600197.SS.summary: Xinjiang Yilite Industry Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells wine in China. The company is also involved in the cogeneration, packaging and printing, and tourism businesses, as well as offers glass products. Xinjiang Yilite Industry Co.,Ltd was founded in 1956 and is based in Urumqi, China.

600199.SS.short_name: ANHUI GOLDEN SEED WINERY CO LTD
600199.SS.long_name: Anhui Golden Seed Winery Co., Ltd.
600199.SS.summary: Anhui Golden Seed Winery Co., Ltd. produces and distributes liquors in China. It provides liquors and wines under the Thai, Golden Seed, drunk three autumn, Yingzhou, and Seeds brands. The company was founded in 1949 and is based in Fuyang, China.

600238.SS.summary: HaiNan Yedao (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the health wine, liquor, food and beverage, real estate development and trade, and investment businesses in China. Its health wine products include deer turtles wine, sea king wine, puree wine, rice wine, and other products. The company is also involved in the development of real estate properties; and trading and factoring activities. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Haikou, China.

600573.SS.summary: FuJian YanJing HuiQuan Brewery Co.,Ltd produces and sells beer primarily in China. The company is based in Quanzhou, China. FuJian YanJing HuiQuan Brewery Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Beijing Yanjing Brewery Co., Ltd.

600600.SS.summary: Tsingtao Brewery Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, distribution, wholesale, and retail sale of beer products worldwide. It operates through seven segments: Shandong Region; South China Region; North China Region; East China Region; Southeast China Region; Hong Kong, Macau and Other Overseas Region; and Finance Company. The company sells its beer products primarily under the Tsingtaoand and Laoshan brand names. It also provides wealth management, and agency collection and payment services; and construction and logistics services. The company was founded in 1903 and is headquartered in Qingdao, the People's Republic of China.

600779.SS.summary: Sichuan Swellfun Co.,Ltd produces and sells liquor and wine. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Chengdu, China.

TSGTF.summary: Tsingtao Brewery Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, distribution, wholesale, and retail sale of beer products worldwide. It operates through seven segments: Shandong Region; South China Region; North China Region; East China Region; Southeast China Region; Hong Kong, Macau and Other Overseas Region; and Finance Company. The company sells its beer products primarily under the Tsingtaoand and Laoshan brand names. It also provides wealth management, and agency collection and payment services; and construction and logistics services. The company was founded in 1903 and is headquartered in Qingdao, the People's Republic of China.
